page.title: 15F of D News 1
page.content: News in the area is published{in'Dean {Forest Guardian'and the 'Review'.This is a selection of news for the area for 29th November.A consortium called {Dean Leisure}propose to build{leisure {park}for{Cannop Ponds}area.Another consortium plan to opencast{mine coal between{Yorkley}and{Parkend.There}is to be a public meeting about this.Van- dals attack cars in a{Coleford}car park.A barn fire destroyed{Â£1000}of hay and straw at{Pingry Lane Coleford. {Supermarket trolleys}cause a nusiance in{car park.Severn Sound Radio}appeals to{readers}to take part in finding the longest way round{Gloucestershire's boundaries.A person's arm was caught in an unguarded concrete mixer.Big crowds of people came to watch the {Lombard RAC}Rally,part of the stages running through{Berry Hill.Crowds}ten deep-cars went{100 mph.
